name: Selectors
description: Selectors are the way of how we can reference DOM elements.

items.name: Universal
items.description: The universal selector, specified simply as an asterisk (*), matches all elements.

items.name: Element
items.description: The universal selector, specified simply as an asterisk (*), matches all elements.

items.name: Id
items.description: The universal selector, specified simply as an asterisk (*), matches all elements.

items.name: Class
items.description: The universal selector, specified simply as an asterisk (*), matches all elements.

items.name: Attribute
items.description: The universal selector, specified simply as an asterisk (*), matches all elements.
